name: The Great Gatsby
description: F. Scott Fitzgerald's tale of wealth, love, and the American Dream.

name: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
description: J.K. Rowling's magical journey into the wizarding world.

name: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: Harper Lee's poignant tale of racial injustice in the American South.

name: Pride and Prejudice
description: Jane Austen's timeless romance set in Regency England.

name: The Alchemist
description: Paulo Coelho's allegorical journey of self-discovery and destiny.
George Orwell's chilling portrayal of a totalitarian society.

name: The Catcher in the Rye
description: J.D. Salinger's exploration of teenage angst and rebellion.

name: The Hobbit
description: J.R.R. Tolkien's epic adventure of Bilbo Baggins and the dwarves.

name: The Da Vinci Code
description: Dan Brown's gripping puzzle of art, religion, and conspiracy.

name: The Kite Runner
description: Khaled Hosseini's tale of friendship, betrayal, and redemption in Afghanistan.

name: Memoirs of a Geisha
description: Arthur Golden's evocative portrayal of a geisha's life in pre-war Japan.
